subject: AI & Agents
title: Which Jobs Will AI Replace?
description: A 60-second lesson on Which Jobs Will AI Replace?.

hook.text: Goldman Sachs predicts 300 million jobs will be affected by AI automation. Affected, not eliminated.

buildup.text: AI automates tasks, not entire jobs. Most jobs are bundles of tasks, some automatable, some not.

discovery.text: Routine, repetitive tasks go first â€” data entry, basic analysis, scheduling.

twist.text: Creative and social tasks were supposed to be safe. Then AI started writing and creating art.

climax.text: The safest jobs require physical dexterity, emotional intelligence, and novel problem-solving.

punchline.text: AI won't replace you. Someone using AI might.

quiz.question: What types of tasks does AI automate first?
